product_name: No Rinse Body Wash - 2 fl. oz.
long_description: Stay clean and smell fresh while traveling the world or trekking through the mountains with this 2 fl. oz. bottle of No Rinse body wash. Easy to use right from the bottle-no diluting required; simply massage the body wash to a lather and towel dry; leaves skin feeling clean and refreshed. 2 fl. oz. bottle of No Rinse body wash meets Transportation Security Administration (TSA) airline regulations for carry-on liquids and gels.
short_description: Stay clean and smell fresh while traveling the world or trekking through the mountains with this 2 fl. oz. bottle of No Rinse body wash.
